data.name: Xerneas

attacks.name: Geomancy
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Fairy Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Rainbow Spear
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

data.name: Xerneas-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Break Through
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: X Blast
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use X Blast during your next turn.

data.name: Xerneas

attacks.name: Aurora Gain
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon has no weakness.

attacks.name: Light of Life
attacks.text: If your opponent has Yveltal (including Yveltal-EX) in play, this attack does 40 more damage.

data.flavorText: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

data.name: Xerneas

attacks.name: Geomancy

data.flavorText: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

data.name: Xerneas BREAK
rules: BREAK Evolution Rule: Xerneas BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.

attacks.name: Life Stream
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

data.name: Xerneas

attacks.name: Geo Hunt
attacks.text: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Aurora Gain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: When the horns on its head shine in seven different colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

data.name: Xerneas

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Bright Horns
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Bright Horns during your next turn.

data.flavorText: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

attacks.name: Break Through
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use X Blast during your next turn.

data.name: Xerneas-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sanctuary-GX
attacks.text: Move all damage counters from each of your Pokémon to your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Xerneas

attacks.name: Rainbow Force
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each different type of Pokémon on your Bench.

attacks.name: Power Creation
attacks.text: If this Pokémon was healed during this turn, this attack does 80 more damage.

data.flavorText: When the horns on its head shine in seven different colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

data.name: Xerneas ◇
rules: ◇ (Prism Star) Rule: You can't have more than 1 ◇ card with the same name in your deck. If a ◇ card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.

abilities.name: Path of Life
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to become your Active Pokémon, you may move any number of Energy from your other Pokémon to it.

attacks.name: Bright Horns
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Bright Horns during your next turn.

data.flavorText: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

data.name: Xerneas

attacks.name: Breath of Life
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards of different types and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.flavorText: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.name: Xerneas ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Rising Horns
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Geo Gate
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Psychic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Bright Horns
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Bright Horns.
